name: Desert
description: Dry, arid biome with minimal vegetation and high temperatures.

name: Forest
description: Dense area of trees and undergrowth, temperate or mixed woodland.

name: Grassland
description: Open plains with grasses and few trees; includes prairie and savanna.

name: Mountain
description: High elevation terrain with peaks, ridges, and steep slopes.

name: Ocean
description: Large saltwater body covering most of the world's surface.

name: Polar
description: Frozen, treeless biome with permafrost and low biodiversity.

name: Swamp
description: Waterlogged, muddy area with dense vegetation and slow-moving water.
